heading: HR00085
0: RESOLUTION CALLING FOR AN INVESTIGATION IN AID OF LEGISLATION BY THE APPROPRIATE COMMITTEE OF THE HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES REGARDING THE STATUS OF THE 650 MW NATURAL GAS-FIRED POWER PLANT AND LIQUIFIED NATURAL GAS (LNG) HUB TERMINAL PROJECT BEING CONSTRUCTED BY ENERGY WORLD CORPORATION (EWC) IN PAGBILAO GRANDE ISLAND, QUEZON PROVINCE
status: Deliberated upon by the Mother Committee on 2017-12-05
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR00085
FULL TITLE : RESOLUTION CALLING FOR AN INVESTIGATION IN AID OF LEGISLATION BY THE APPROPRIATE COMMITTEE OF THE HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES REGARDING THE STATUS OF THE 650 MW NATURAL GAS-FIRED POWER PLANT AND LIQUIFIED NATURAL GAS (LNG) HUB TERMINAL PROJECT BEING CONSTRUCTED BY ENERGY WORLD CORPORATION (EWC) IN PAGBILAO GRANDE ISLAND, QUEZON PROVINCE
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : SUAREZ, DANILO E.
DATE FILED : 2016-07-18
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE
COMMITEE HEARINGS/ACTIONS:
      1. Referred to Stakeholders on 2016-09-20
      2. Deliberated upon by the Mother Committee on 2017-12-05
          -The Committee suspended consideration of House Resolution No. 85, pending submission of reports by the EWC and the National Grid Corporation of the Philippines (NGCP) to update the Committee on their compliance with their obligation under the contract.
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON ENERGY ON 2016-09-05
PREVIOUS COMMITTEE REFERRALS :PRIMARILY REFERRED TO RULES on 2016-08-02;
